name: Vitamin A Champions
title: Top Vitamin A Supplementation Coverage
description: In 2022, Guinea achieved a remarkable Vitamin A supplementation coverage rate of 97% for children aged 6-59 months, showcasing its commitment to child health.

name: Financial Powerhouse
title: Leading in Financial Intermediary Services
description: Guinea's financial intermediary services reached a total of 3,656,694,434,200 LCU in 2022, indicating a robust financial sector.

name: Tourism's Tiny Footprint
title: Minimal Impact of Tourism on Economy
description: In 2020, international tourism receipts accounted for only 0.014% of Guinea's total exports, highlighting a limited role of tourism in the economy.

name: Healthcare Hurdles
title: Low Physician Density
description: With only 0.021 physicians per 1,000 people in 2022, Guinea faces significant challenges in healthcare accessibility.

name: Travel Services Scarcity
title: Negligible Travel Service Imports
description: In 2022, travel services constituted just 0.011% of Guinea's service imports, indicating a minimal reliance on international travel services.

name: Gender Gap in Education
title: Low Female Representation Among Teachers
description: In 2021, only 5.8% of secondary education teachers in Guinea were female, reflecting a significant gender disparity in the education sector.

name: Metal Import Minimalists
title: Low Ores and Metals Import Share
description: In 2016, ores and metals made up just 0.31% of Guinea's merchandise imports, suggesting a limited dependency on these resources.
